amendment.description: Amendment instructs the Federal Housing Administration to continue the special forbearance program, as it relates to Chinese Drywall, until the end of FY 2011.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 111-503 to instruct the Federal Housing Administration to continue the Special Forbearance program, as it relates to Chinese Drywall, until the end of FY 2011.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nye amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
